AggOO::ImageFilter

AggOO::ImageFilter< PixFmt > Class Template Reference

#include <AggOOStyleHandlerImage.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<class PixFmt>
class AggOO::ImageFilter< PixFmt >

Base class for the image filter wrappers. The subclasses will wrap an agg::span_image_filter_*, which is used for the scanline generation.
